types.name: amazonqConversationId
types.description: Uniquely identifies a message with which the user interacts.

types.name: codewhispererterminal_command
types.description: The CLI tool a completion was for

types.name: codewhispererterminal_duration
types.description: A duration in milliseconds

types.name: codewhispererterminal_timeToSuggestion
types.description: How long the AI model roundtrip took

types.name: codewhispererterminal_accepted
types.description: Whether the user accepted a completion

types.name: codewhispererterminal_suggestionState
types.description: The result of a suggestion from the service

types.name: codewhispererterminal_typedCount
types.description: A count of characters in the user edit buffer prior to accepting a suggestion

types.name: codewhispererterminal_suggestedCount
types.description: A count of characters in an accepted suggestion

types.name: codewhispererterminal_subcommand
types.description: A codewhisperer CLI subcommand

types.name: codewhispererterminal_doctorCheck
types.description: A codewhisperer CLI doctor check

types.name: codewhispererterminal_menuBarItem
types.description: A dashboard menu bar item

types.name: codewhispererterminal_route
types.description: The local route of a dashboard page

types.name: codewhispererterminal_terminal
types.description: The user terminal

types.name: codewhispererterminal_terminalVersion
types.description: The user terminal version

types.name: codewhispererterminal_shell
types.description: The user shell

types.name: codewhispererterminal_inCloudshell
types.description: Whether the CLI is running in the AWS CloudShell environment

types.name: codewhispererterminal_shellVersion
types.description: The user shell version

types.name: codewhispererterminal_oldClientId
types.description: The old client id that was generated incorrectly and is used to correlate old events

types.name: credentialStartUrl
types.description: The start URL of current SSO connection

types.name: requestId
types.description: The id assigned to an AWS request

types.name: oauthFlow
types.description: The oauth authentication flow executed by the user, e.g. device code or PKCE

types.name: result
types.description: Whether or not the operation succeeded

types.name: reason
types.description: Description of what caused an error, if any

types.name: codewhispererterminal_toolUseId
types.description: The id assigned to the client by the model representing a tool use event

types.name: codewhispererterminal_toolName
types.description: The name associated with a tool

types.name: codewhispererterminal_isToolUseAccepted
types.description: Denotes if a tool use event has been fulfilled

types.name: codewhispererterminal_toolUseIsSuccess
types.description: The outcome of a tool use

types.name: codewhispererterminal_utteranceId
types.description: Id associated with a given response from the model

types.name: codewhispererterminal_userInputId
types.description: Id associated with a given user input. This is used to differentiate responses to user input and that of retries from tool uses. This id is the utterance id of the first response following an user input

types.name: codewhispererterminal_isToolValid
types.description: If the use of tool as instructed by the model is valid

types.name: codewhispererterminal_contextFileLength
types.description: The length of the files included as part of context management

metrics.name: amazonq_startChat
metrics.description: Captures start of the conversation with amazonq /dev

metrics.name: codewhispererterminal_addChatMessage
metrics.description: Captures active usage with Q Chat in shell

metrics.name: amazonq_endChat
metrics.description: Captures end of the conversation with amazonq /dev

metrics.name: codewhispererterminal_refreshCredentials
metrics.description: Emitted when users refresh their credentials

metrics.name: codewhispererterminal_cliSubcommandExecuted
metrics.description: Emitted on CW CLI subcommand executed

metrics.name: codewhispererterminal_doctorCheckFailed
metrics.description: Emitted when CW CLI user fails a doctor check

metrics.name: codewhispererterminal_dashboardPageViewed
metrics.description: Emitted when a user views a dashboard page

metrics.name: codewhispererterminal_menuBarActioned
metrics.description: Emitted when a user clicks the menu bar

metrics.name: codewhispererterminal_figUserMigrated
metrics.description: Emitted when a user migrates from fig

metrics.name: codewhispererterminal_migrateOldClientId
metrics.description: Emitted once for users who generated an invalid client id

metrics.name: codewhispererterminal_toolUseSuggested
metrics.description: Emitted once per tool use to report outcome of tool use suggested
